HSAMPLE30001104
T3000000B	X .NUM 000B
T3001E300	LEA r1, x3100
T30022400	LD r2, x3000
T30035020	AND r0, r0, 0
T30046640	LDR r3,r1,0
T30051003	ADD r0,r0,r3
T30061261	ADD r1,r1,1
T300714BF	ADD r2,r2, -1
T30080604	BRZP x04
T3009F031	TRAP x31
T300AF025	TRAP x25
T31000001						! this line and below puts 1 in each memory location to be added
T31010001
T31020001
T31030001
T31040001
T31050001
T31060001
T31070001
T31080001
T31090001
T310A0001
T310B0001
E3001
